casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Abner Ray NICHOLSON. No. 564A99-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Nora Henry Hargrove, Sofie Hosford, Wilmington, for Nicholson.

Abner Ray Nicholson, Pro Se.

Valerie B. Spalding, Special Deputy Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of June 2005 by Arc of North Carolina for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed. By order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
